person.persName: James Hart Purdy (New York City, New York, medical student and soldier)

body.p: New York City, New York, medical student and soldier. New York native. Son of Lewis Purdy and Mary Ann Hart Purdy. Resident of Westchester County, New York, in 1850. Medical student in New York City in 1861. Served in the 59th New York Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as lieutenant, captain, and major from October 12, 1861, to April 30, 1863. Served as major in the Mississippi Marine Brigade (U.S.A.) near Vicksburg, Mississippi, in 1864.
